name: Internal Server Error
description: The server encountered an unexpected condition.

name: Not Implemented
description: The server does not support the request method.

name: Bad Gateway
description: The server received an invalid response from an upstream server.

name: Service Unavailable
description: The server is currently unavailable.

name: Gateway Timeout
description: The server did not receive a timely response.

name: HTTP Version Not Supported
description: The server does not support the HTTP version used in the request.

name: Continue
description: The client should continue the request.

name: Switching Protocols
description: The server is switching protocols.

name: Processing
description: The request is being processed but no response is available yet.

name: Early Hints
description: Allows preloading resources while the server prepares a response.

name: Bad Request
description: The server could not understand the request.

name: Unauthorized
description: Authentication is required.

name: Forbidden
description: The server refuses to fulfill the request.

name: Not Found
description: The requested resource could not be found.

name: Method Not Allowed
description: The request method is not supported.

name: Request Timeout
description: The server timed out waiting for the request.

name: Too Many Requests
description: The client has sent too many requests in a given time.

name: Multiple Choices
description: The request has multiple possible responses.

name: Moved Permanently
description: The resource has been moved permanently.

name: Found
description: The resource has been temporarily moved.

name: See Other
description: The response is available at a different URI.

name: Not Modified
description: The resource has not been modified.

name: Temporary Redirect
description: The request should be repeated at another URI.

name: Permanent Redirect
description: The request should be repeated at another URI permanently.

name: OK
description: The request succeeded.

name: Created
description: A new resource was created.

name: Accepted
description: The request has been received but not yet acted upon.

name: Non-Authoritative Information
description: Metadata is from a third-party copy.

name: No Content
description: No content to send, but headers may be useful.

name: Reset Content
description: Tells the client to reset the document.

name: Partial Content
description: Response to a range request.
